item.name: text
item.value: Federal Reserve lowers interest rates for the fourth time this year. In a move to benefit the housing market, this establishes the fact that the Fed recognizes the sluggish job market. Read more...

item.name: text
item.value: FiCorp's CEO, Adam Spellman has agreed to a new five year deal to stay with the bank. This ensures his legacy alongside of his Father, David Spellman, who started the bank twenty-five years ago. Read more...

item.name: text
item.value: A new merger was announced yesterday on CNN indicating FiCorp's buyout of Knight Financial Systems. This procurment increases Ficorp's interest in the financial trade industry, now becoming a major player. Read more...

item.name: text
item.value: An overseas downfall in India makes for a great opportunity for FiCorp to expand it's international boundaries. Read more...
